income.description: An object containing the adjustments to the income values.

rentIncome.description: The adjustment to total property rental income. The total amount of property rental income. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: The adjustment to premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

reversePremiums.description: The adjustment to reverse premiums and inducements. Any expense or partial expense that cannot be claimed for tax purposes. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

otherPropertyIncome.description: The adjustment to other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

expenses.description: An object containing the adjustments to the expenses values.

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, insurance, ground rents etc. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

repairsAndMaintenance.description: The adjustment to property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

financialCosts.description: The adjustment to loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

professionalFees.description: The adjustment to legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

travelCosts.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

costOfServices.description: The adjustment to cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

residentialFinancialCost.description: The adjustment to the residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to other allowable property expenses. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

consolidatedExpenses.description: The adjustment to the sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

rentIncome.description: The adjustment to total property rental income. The total amount of property rental Income. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

expenses.description: Total expenses broken down by type for the accounting period.

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, insurance, ground rents and others. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to other allowable property expenses. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

seIncome.description: An object containing the adjustments to the income values.

turnover.description: The adjustment to takings, fees, sales or money earned by your business. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to any other business income not included in the turnover. Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

seExpenses.description: An object containing the adjustments to the expenses values.

costOfGoodsBought.description: The adjustment to the cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

cisPaymentsToSubcontractors.description: The adjustment to payments to subcontractors - Construction Industry Scheme (CIS). Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

staffCosts.description: The adjustment to wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

travelCosts.description: The adjustment to car, van and travel expenses. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

premisesRunningCosts.description: The adjustment to rent, rates, power and insurance costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

maintenanceCosts.description: The adjustment to repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

adminCosts.description: The adjustment to phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

advertisingCosts.description: The adjustment to advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

businessEntertainmentCosts.description: The adjustment to business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

interest.description: The adjustment to interest on bank and other loans. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

financialCharges.description: The adjustment to bank, credit card and other financial charges. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

badDebt.description: The adjustment to irrecoverable debts written off. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

professionalFees.description: The adjustment to accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

depreciation.description: The adjustment to depreciation and loss or profit on sales of assets. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

other.description: The adjustment to other expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

consolidatedExpenses.description: The adjustment to the sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 (excluding 0 or 0.00).

seAdditions.description: A breakdown of the adjustable additions for the accounting period.
